title: Clear Scalp and Hair Intense Hydration Nourishing Conditioner, 12.7 Ounce
description: Resilient, beautiful hair starts with the right foundation. Clear scalp and hair has a dual-action formulation: a white stripe of deep hydrating treatment, and an aqua stripe infused with cactus extract. It deeply hydrates the scalp and leaves hair resilient and beautiful.

title: CeraVe Baby Lotion, 8 Ounce
description: Developed with pediatric dermatologists, CeraVe Baby Moisturizing Lotion is formulated with 3 essential ceramides (ceramide 3, ceramide 6-II, ceramide 1) and is free of parabens and phthalates for a healthy way to care for your baby’s delicate skin. Designed to temporarily protect and help relieve chafed, chapped or cracked skin. CeraVe Baby Moisturizing Lotion helps protect baby’s skin from the drying effects of wind and cold weather.
